title:u/pandapaxxy's Adept Trials (Season of the Hunt) breakdown, Controller edition
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/juwl4p/iron_banner_and_trials_controller/

// Astral Horizon (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "Did you ask for a kinetic Mindbenders? Because we got a kinetic Mindbenders. In PvE Swash or 1-2p is certainly the way to go for chunking down majors or ultras but you should have one already. And if you’re going into trials looking for a PvE shotgun you’re mistaken." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve

// Astral Horizon (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "PvP is all this gun was made for. We’re still figuring out the effects of the most recent shotgun nerf but I’m confident that Full Choke is among the best options. In true god roll form you’ll have quickdraw to make up for the handling so Barrel Shroud is out, and range isn’t nearly as important so Rifled Barrel is out too. NEVER USE SMOOTHBORE. In terms of mag perks Assault Mag is just a direct upgrade, and both Light Mag and Tactical Mag are nice increases to reload and mag size respectively. In terms of your trait perks Quickdraw is by and away the best perk there, and Opening Shot is incredible post-nerf." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pvp
dimwishlist:item=532746994&perks=1047830412,791862061,706527188,47981717
dimwishlist:item=532746994&perks=1332244541,791862061,706527188,47981717
dimwishlist:item=532746994&perks=1047830412,3142289711,706527188,47981717

dimwishlist:item=532746994&perks=1332244541,106909392,706527188,3511092054


// Eye of Sol (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "The Trials sniper is alright at best. It won’t beat Revoker over the best in slot, and can’t really beat Beloved for best in its class. There’s arguments for Tranquility, Long Shadow and Eye of Sol, but other than the novelty of “Shortgaze” you probably won’t see this often. This sniper can get Vorpal Weapon and Box Breathing which can both take out supers post sniper nerf. But I don’t know if that will push it over Revoker or any other sniper due to the 45 zoom that comes standard." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve
dimwishlist:item=3637570176&perks=1840239774,1087426260,1168162263,1546637391

// Eye of Sol (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "The Trials sniper is alright at best. It won’t beat Revoker over the best in slot, and can’t really beat Beloved for best in its class. There’s arguments for Tranquility, Long Shadow and Eye of Sol, but other than the novelty of “Shortgaze” you probably won’t see this often. This sniper can get Vorpal Weapon and Box Breathing which can both take out supers post sniper nerf. But I don’t know if that will push it over Revoker or any other sniper due to the 45 zoom that comes standard." Recommended MW - Handling or Range.|tags:controller,pvp

// The Scholar (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "The base 37 handling is just abysmal. Then the only poor stat is stability. MnK doesn’t necessarily need it, but it will help for follow up shots as damage drop off from a lack of range isn’t going to be prevalent on any map. In the final slot you could opt for Vorpal Weapon to do more damage to supers or No Distractions to almost ensure the three tap." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve

In the final slot you could opt for Vorpal Weapon to do more damage to supers or No Distractions to almost ensure the three tap." Recommended MW - Stability or Handling.|tags:controller,pvp

// The Summoner (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvE): "is the next hottest thing [...] It’s almost fitting that the trials auto is also 600 RPM. Like with some of the faction weapons Overflow is just a utility perk that will passively help you. Another great perk is Rangefinder to push out the effective range as much as possible. One thing to note is the recoil direction is poor, so something like Extended Barrel to improve the range while also increasing that recoil direction will help out a ton. Slap on a Counterbalance mod and you’ll be freeing up your exotic slot." Recommended MW - Reload.|tags:controller,pve

// The Summoner (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (Controller / PvP): "is the next hottest thing [...] It’s almost fitting that the trials auto is also 600 RPM. Like with some of the faction weapons Overflow is just a utility perk that will passively help you. Another great perk is Rangefinder to push out the effective range as much as possible. One thing to note is the recoil direction is poor, so something like Extended Barrel to improve the range while also increasing that recoil direction will help out a ton. Slap on a Counterbalance mod and you’ll be freeing up your exotic slot." Recommended MW - Stability or Handling.|tags:controller,pvp
